name: Welcome to the Apocalyptic World
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhua
content: Gao Xiaoliang, an ordinary college student, never imagined his life would take such a bizarre turn. After a freak car accident, he wakes up to find himself bound to a mysterious “Food System” that grants him unique culinary powers. Transported to a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies on the brink of collapse, Gao Liang must survive this dangerous new reality. Can Gao Xiaoliang survive in this apocalyptic world with his food stall and uncover why he was sent here?Original Webtoon: AC.QQ, Bi
